name: Implement TargetSpawnerService
description: Implement target spawner that spawns red cubes at random positions within play area

behavior: Spawns targets at random positions in 10x10 area at z=5
X range: -5 to 5, Y range: 0 to 5
Destroys current target before spawning new one
Does not spawn if game is won
Requires target prefab reference (addressable or Resources)

successCriteria: Uses IScoreService to check win state
